ChapterShortDescription: Google Developers Group Savannah is an initiative to concentrate the efforts of many developers in and around Savannah to learn, share and get productive using the various Google development products.
ChapterLongDec: Google Developer Group Savannah is inspired by GTUG/GDG Family. We started our journey in July 2019. We try to engage student developers, fresh graduates and professionals through our hack events & meetups. The motive is to create a local ecosystem of programmers & hackers in and around the Savanah area. The main goal of the group is to educate and network among neighbors while learning and sharing resources about Google's various technology offerings.
aboutGDGProgram: GDGs are local groups of developers who are specifically interested in Google products and APIs. Each local group is called a GDG chapter and can host a variety of technical activities for developers - from just a few people getting together to watch our latest videos, to large gatherings with demos and tech talks, to hackathons.
